metadata.synopsis: one liner for the female halfling from the Bloomridge paranoia vignette
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 199, 35, -62- Talk to the female halfling from the vignette.

0.speaker: Thyssa Shineboot
0.text: Bloody ridiculous. Some folk must live a charmed life if a child playing in the street's their greatest worry.

1.speaker: Thyssa Shineboot
1.text: I used to play in these very streets when I was young, myself. Nobody's got the right to deny a child their childhood.
